name: Plantea Shop
text: Demo e-commerce website designed as plant shop. The home page, product page, and pop-up message templates were sourced from Uizard. Building upon this foundation, I aimed to create a consistent style and atmosphere throughout the entire website, while also making strategic design decisions for other functional elements.

features.title: Product Catalog 🌱
features.content: providing categories, sorting and searching functionality

features.title: Shopping Cart and Checkout 🛒
features.content: enables add products, review their selections, and proceed to the checkout process to symulate a purchasing experience

features.title: Blog Section 📝
features.content: where users can explore informative and engaging posts related to plants

features.title: Responsive Design 📱
features.content: ensuring compatibility across different devices and screen sizes

name: Sky Support
text: Web application designed to provide space for inspiration and enhanced focus with tailored sky images based on users preferences.

features.title: Personalized Sky Images ☁️
features.content: utilizing geolocation API, the app generates sky images that match your location or search terms

features.title: Greek Philosophical Wisdom 🏺
features.content: in form of random quotes, to find inspiration and share it on Twitter or on Pinterest

features.title: Soothing Sounds 🎵
features.content: provides serene atmosphere with calming sounds such as thunderstorms, chirping birds, classical music, or household sounds

name: Emotions Assistant
text: Single-page web application (SPA) designed to assist users in recognizing and managing their emotions effectively. With a focus on emotional integration and well-being, the app provides a guided step-by-step process to help users navigate their emotions and cultivate self-care.

features.title: Guided Emotional Integration 🌈
features.content: starting with breathing exercises, then emotion selection, allowing users to select their current mood and provide additional context

features.title: Emotion Journal 📔
features.content: where users can express and reflect on their emotions in a free flow of thoughts or using prompts with helpful questions to stimulate the journaling

features.title: Personalized Report 📄
features.content: of emotional integration journey in PDF format, serving as a tangible record of progress and insights gained throughout the process

features.title: Helpful Resources 📚
features.content: supporting users to seek or use free professional help in the journey of cultivating emotional well-being
